tasks.task: Wear extra protection when mixing and loading pesticides.
subtasks: Use an apron over protective equipment.
Avoid ripping open paper and cardboard containers to prevent dust from spreading.
Place containers on a low, flat surface for opening.
Use a sharp knife or scissors to open containers.
Wash knife or scissors with soap and water before reuse.
Use knife or scissors solely for opening pesticide containers.

tasks.task: Follow label directions when measuring pesticide.
subtasks: Determine the required amount of pesticide as per label directions.
Pour liquids slowly to avoid splashes.
Ensure face and eyes are elevated above the pesticide container during pouring.
